name: ENExposureWindow
desc: A set of scan events from observed beacons within a time span.

items.name: var date: Date
items.desc: The date that the exposure occurred.

items.name: var diagnosisReportType: ENDiagnosisReportType
items.desc: The report type of the observed diagnosis.

items.name: var infectiousness: ENInfectiousness
items.desc: How infectious the user is, based on the number of days since the onset of symptoms.

items.name: var scanInstances: [ENScanInstance]
items.desc: An array of scans corresponding to a beacon associated with an exposure.

items.name: var variantOfConcernType: ENVariantOfConcernType
items.desc: The variant of concern associated with this user.

items.name: enum ENVariantOfConcernType
items.desc: A set of user-definable types that indicate variants of concern.
